statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE merchant_id = 5 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, merchant_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE merchant_id = 456
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_transaction_amount > 500;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE is_suspended = FALSE ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_date FROM fraud_alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE
SELECT user_accounts.account_id, user_id, account_balance, is_suspended FROM user_accounts JOIN transaction_history ON user_accounts.account_id = transaction_history.account_id
SELECT * FROM fraud_alerts WHERE LENGTH(alert_message) > 50
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT bank_name, bank_location, total_assets FROM banks WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_status FROM transactions_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT bank_name, total_assets FROM banks WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT bank_name, bank_location, total_assets FROM banks WHERE bank_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_details WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT flag_reason, flagged_date FROM fraud_flags ORDER BY flagged_date DESC;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM transaction_metadata WHERE transaction_id = 10 ORDER BY metadata_key ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
